items.content_html: Chip-8 Emulator: A lightweight Chip-8 emulator written in JavaScript, designed to run classic Chip-8 games in your web browser. Simple, efficient, and easy to use, this emulator supports the core Chip-8 instruction set and is ideal for learning and experimenting with retro computing.
